name: Real Estate-Land Title, etc., Co. et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Record Co.
name_abbreviation: Real Estate-Land Title v. Philadelphia Record Co.

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Walling, Simpson, Kephart, Sadler, Schaffer and Maxey, JJ.
parties: Real Estate-Land Title, etc., Co. et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Record Co.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The opinion of the learned trial judge of the lower court states so concisely and correctly the questions involved in this appeal, and the legal conclusion applicable, that nothing further need be said by us; on his opinion.
The judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William N. Trinkle, of Bell, Trinkle, Truscott & Bell, for appellant.
J. J. Rothschild, of Fox, Rothschild, O’Brien & Frankel, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Real Estate-Land Title, etc., Co. et al., Appellants, v. Philadelphia Record Co.
Argued December 5, 1930.
Before Frazer, C. J., Walling, Simpson, Kephart, Sadler, Schaffer and Maxey, JJ.
William N. Trinkle, of Bell, Trinkle, Truscott & Bell, for appellant.
J. J. Rothschild, of Fox, Rothschild, O’Brien & Frankel, for appellee.
January 5, 1931:
